title: "Nikon Nikon Live View Dataset"

---

# Nikon Nikon Live View Dataset

Dataset structures define the format of complex data returned by PTP operations.

## NikonLiveViewDataset

### Properties

| Property | Type | Required |
| -------- | ---- | -------- |
| **majorVersion** | `number` | ✓ |
| **minorVersion** | `number` | ✓ |
| **displayInfoSize** | `number` | ✓ |
| **liveViewImageSize** | `number` | ✓ |
| **wholeSize** | `object` | ✓ |
| **displayAreaSize** | `object` | ✓ |
| **displayCenterCoords** | `object` | ✓ |
| **liveViewImageImageSize** | `object` | ✓ |
| **liveViewImageQuality** | `number` | ✓ |
| **afDrivingEnabled** | `number` | ✓ |
| **focusDrivingStatus** | `number` | ✓ |
| **focusingJudgementResult** | `number` | ✓ |
| **afModeState** | `number` | ✓ |
| **afAreaNumber** | `number` | ✓ |
| **selectedSubjectIndex** | `number` | ✓ |
| **trackingState** | `number` | ✓ |
| **afFrameSize** | `object` | ✓ |
| **afFrameCenterCoords** | `object` | ✓ |
| **remainingVideoTime** | `number` | ✓ |
| **elapsedVideoTime** | `number` | ✓ |
| **soundIndicatorPeakL** | `number` | ✓ |
| **soundIndicatorPeakR** | `number` | ✓ |
| **soundIndicatorCurrentL** | `number` | ✓ |
| **soundIndicatorCurrentR** | `number` | ✓ |
| **videoRecordingInfo** | `number` | ✓ |
| **syncRecordingState** | `number` | ✓ |
| **timecodeStatus** | `number` | ✓ |
| **timecodeHour** | `number` | ✓ |
| **timecodeMinute** | `number` | ✓ |
| **timecodeSecond** | `number` | ✓ |
| **timecodeFrame** | `number` | ✓ |
| **countdownTime** | `number` | ✓ |
| **spotWbCondition** | `number` | ✓ |
| **rotation** | `number` | ✓ |
| **levelAngleRolling** | `number` | ✓ |
| **levelAnglePitching** | `number` | ✓ |
| **levelAngleYawing** | `number` | ✓ |
| **usingWhiteBalanceForPhotoLv** | `number` | ✓ |
| **imagingTemperatureStatus** | `number` | ✓ |
| **reserved** | `Uint8Array` | ✓ |
| **afFrameData** | `Uint8Array` | ✓ |
| **autoCaptureSubjectDetection** | `Uint8Array` | ✓ |
| **reservedEnd** | `Uint8Array` | ✓ |
| **liveViewImage** | `Uint8Array` | ✓ |
